seq.a: the dates are finalized(by the Coordination Unit )
the Support Officer updates al group calendars and creates meeting folders for each meeting and ensures all appropriate documents are uploaded to system
Committee Members are advised a week before each meeting to read all related documents
The Committee Members hold their meeting
the Support Office then produces minutes including any Action Points for each Committee Member
Within 5 working days, the Coordination Unit must conduct a QA check on the minutes
the QA check are then sent to all Committee Members
The Support Officer then updates all departmental records
